resources.string: Jarvis Assistant requires accessibility access to provide system-wide assistance, overlay controls, and intelligent automation features.
Jarvis needs microphone access to understand your voice commands and have conversations with you.
Camera access allows Jarvis to help with visual tasks like scanning documents and recognizing objects.
Notification permission lets Jarvis send you important alerts and reminders.
SMS access allows Jarvis to help manage your text messages and send messages on your behalf.
Contact access helps Jarvis understand who you\'re talking about and manage your address book.
Phone state access helps Jarvis understand when you\'re in a call and provide appropriate assistance.
Overlay permission allows Jarvis to show helpful information and controls on top of other apps.
Settings access lets Jarvis adjust system settings for automation and convenience.
Notification access allows Jarvis to read and manage all your notifications intelligently.
Accessibility service enables Jarvis to provide system-wide assistance and automation.
Package visibility helps Jarvis understand what apps you have installed for better integration.
